item.title: New Boneless-v3 and the Gizmotron
item.description: Working Boneless v3 Finally managed to get the new version of the processor running on my TinyBx this is in concert with nmigen , nmigen-boards and Boneless v3. I have wrapped all this into my workbench for the project in Gizmotron Gizmos from .gizmo import Gizmo, IO from nmigen import * class _warmboot(Elaboratable): def __init__(self): self.image = Signal(2) self.boot = Signal() def elaborate(self, platform): m = Module() m.submodules.wb = Instance("SB_WARMBOOT", i_S1 = self.

item.title: Steve part 5
item.description:
mmmm BRAINS

Now that I have the TinyBX mounted and connected the time has come to get some gateware going. After some research I settled on nMigen. It is constant development and m-labs is working hard to get it running. There is a repository of my code as I develop it.
